title: Windows 8.1 X64 3in1 ESD en-US Sep 2016 {Gen2}
description:
* Windows 8.1 X64 3in1 ESD en-US Sep 2016 {Gen2}


[ RELEASE INFO ]


* File: WIN81.X64ESD.en-US.Sep2016.iso
* Size: 4,74GB
* Format: Bootable ISO

* CRC32: 04ba504b
* MD5 : 8d30d3f5682e2d01b7dffcdaf208d353
* SHA-1: 7f811c223c1b2796f1cf872465b8c9ec56254ed5

[ SOURCES ]

* dvd-6051480 & dvd-6054382

[ CONTENTS ]

* Integrated / Pre-installed:

* .NET Framework 3.5 Enabled
* .NET Framework 4.6.2 ( KB3120803 )
* Important & Security Updates - 2016-08-13

* Setupcomplete / Post-install:

* Defender Updates

[ FEATURES ]

* UEFI-ready 
* (Use attached Rufus USB-tool to make UEFI-bootable).
* install.wim compressed to recovery format (install.esd)
* Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 8.1 (Microsoft DaRT)

[ LANGUAGE ]

* en-US = ENGLISH US

[ EDITIONS INCLUDED ]

* Windows 8.1 Home
* Windows 8.1 Pro
* Windows 8.1 Enterprise

Activation by KMS
(Exclusions are pre-set in Defender)

[ SCREENSHOTS ]

[url]https://extraimago.com/image/w38w[/url]

[ ACTIVATION INSTRUCTIONS ]

* A WPI-window will pop up in the last phase of the installation.  
* For activation, select "KMS" and click on "Begin Install".
* To skip activation, just click on "Exit".

[ SCREENSHOTS ]

[url]https://extraimago.com/image/wboW[/url]

[ INSTALLATION & INFORMATION ]

* Create bootable USB (highly recommended) with Rufus,
* (attached) or burn to DVD-DL at slow speed.

[ CREDITS ]

* ashish.k, milrob & stevie-boy 
* for continued support & help with user questions.

* Hope you will enjoy this release!

* Regards,
* Generation2 @ ET & TPB
